text: What did Munyard say? 'The Snort -hull fitting fractured. Supposing I was to tell you that we've had Pericles' entire Snort equipment removed and X-rayed and that it was as sound as a bell?' said John.
handwritten_text: What did Munyard say? 'The Snort -hull fitting fractured. Supposing I was to tell you that we've had Pericles' entire Snort equipment removed and X-rayed and that it was as sound as a bell?' said John.
